rooms.description: A spacious area blending an entry hall with a living room featuring bohemian decor elements such as eclectic furniture, vibrant textiles, and artistic installations.
rooms.vastu_note: North-east corner is ideal for living areas to promote prosperity.

rooms.description: An integrated kitchen space with an adjoining dining area, designed using open-plan layout with a central island. Includes floor-to-ceiling windows along the south wall for natural light.
rooms.vastu_note: South is beneficial for cooking areas and ensures proper ventilation.

rooms.description: A dedicated, quiet office space featuring modern furnishings and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows facing north to boost concentration.
rooms.vastu_note: North direction fosters clarity and focus in work.

rooms.description: Tri-level studio apartment that includes a flexible space for dining, lounging, or creative workspace, designed with bohemian aesthetics featuring art pieces and vintage furniture.
rooms.vastu_note: West area enhances creativity and artistic expression.

rooms.description: A compact yet functional bathroom designed for both comfort and style, including modern fixtures with a natural ventilation system.
rooms.vastu_note: Placing bathrooms away from the main living areas is advisable.

openings.description: A large, inviting entrance door placed on the east side to harness positive energy according to Vastu principles.
Provides secure access for service and utilities.

levels.vastu_overview: The design incorporates Vastu principles by orienting living areas towards the north-east, the home office to the north, and kitchen along the south. The multipurpose studio is positioned on the west, aligning with creativity and artistic expression.
